Question.Subject: can anyone tell me a good and honest way to earn some cash online?
Question.Content:
hello
i know there are some honest ways left to make money on the internet. i keep reading about filling surveys and market researches for money. the bad part is they only work mainly for the U.S, Canada Australia and some other parts of the worlds. except my part if there is a way someone knows about i would really like to read about it
thanks a lot
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Well, everyone works differently, but I work best by getting a book from the library, or a bookstore, or even borrowing one, reading it, and just trying it out on my own.
You can hire a tutor, use a book, online tutorials, ask others you know who are programmers to help, etc.

Answer.Content:
Well, everyone works differently, but I work best by getting a book from the library, or a bookstore, or even borrowing one, reading it, and just trying it out on my own.
You can hire a tutor, use a book, online tutorials, ask others you know who are programmers to help, etc.

Working from home means one of two things: A) you have a good idea of the product or service you want to market and have the means to do market it with out much help. B) you are in need of a business model that you can adapt and you wish to piggy back on the other companies expertise. The first does not require that you pay a start up fee but the second does. So, if you don't have a business in mind that you can start right away from your home without anyone' help. You have to pay a start up fee.

Smart Bargain Hunters is a good website for making money online. If you are patient and use a good bidding strategy you can usually win items that cost around $300 while only spending $30. Then just sell back the items on Ebay for around retail price.

Check out Swagbucks! You get points (bucks) for searching. They also hide codes that give you more points. I have been on for a week and already have 210-- you need 450 to get $5 amazon card. Check out my referal page! http://www.swagbucks.com/refer/brandileigh2003
